abstract: Rio Tinto said it was making a joint bid with Mitsubishi Corporation for the shares in the Australian mining company Coal & Allied they don’t already own for about $1.6 billion.
snippet: Rio Tinto said it was making a joint bid with Mitsubishi Corporation for the shares in the Australian mining company Coal & Allied they don’t already own for about $1.6 billion.
lead_paragraph: Rio Tinto said on Monday that it was making a joint bid with the Mitsubishi Corporation for all the shares in the Australian mining company Coal & Allied they don’t already own for about $1.6 billion.

headline.main: Rio and Mitsubishi Bid $1.6 Billion for Coal & Allied
